meanings.definition: Unable to be justified or forgiven
meanings.sent1: The inexcusableness of his actions left everyone shocked.
meanings.sent2: Her inexcusableness behavior at the party caused a lot of embarrassment.
meanings.sent3: The inexcusableness of eating ice cream with a fork made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusableness of his lies was like a dark cloud hanging over him.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusableness of cheating on the test was crystal clear to the teacher.

meanings.definition: Lacking any valid reason or excuse
meanings.sent1: The inexcusableness of his tardiness was frustrating for the team.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring the deadline was an act of inexcusableness that could not be overlooked.
meanings.sent3: The inexcusableness of wearing sunglasses indoors made him look silly.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusableness of his absence was a glaring sign of irresponsibility.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusableness of forgetting her birthday was a huge disappointment for her.
